metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36138 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in decode_frame in libavcodec/tiff.c in FFmpeg version 4.3, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36138` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libavcodec-extra - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libavcodec-extra59 - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libavcodec59 - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libavdevice59 - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libavfilter-extra - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libavfilter-extra8 - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libavfilter8 - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libavformat-extra - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libavformat-extra59 - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libavformat59 - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libavutil57 - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libpostproc56 - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libswresample4 - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
libswscale6 - 7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:5.1.1-1ubuntu1').
